ch.bfh.btx8081.w2015.red.Schlurp.persistenceLayer

Class UserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.bfh.btx8081.w2015.red.Schlurp.persistenceLayer.UserManager

  • public class UserManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The UserManager is used to call certain Methods from the class Infopage and MedicineManager.

    The Methods are used to link the Application Logic with the Data provided by the text Files and the Data entered by the User.

    Author:
    Rea, Mauro
